嬬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［rú］
［《廣韻》人朱切，平虞，日。］
［《集韻》詢趨切，平虞，心。］
(1)柔弱。
(2)妾。

嬬字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　嬬； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页272第44
【集韻】詢趨切，音須。【說文】弱也。一曰下妻。【易·歸妹】歸妹以須。【吳澄曰】荀陸作嬬。　又【廣韻】人朱切【集韻】汝朱切，?音襦。【博雅】妻謂之嬬。一曰妾名。　又【集韻】乃豆切，音耨。女字。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　嬬; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 272 44
【Jiyun】Inquiries tend to be sharp, and the tone must be. [Said the text] Weak too. One said the next wife. 【Yi·Guimei】Guimei Yixu. [Wu Cheng said] Xun Lu Zuozhu.　[Guang Yun] Zhu Qi [Ji Yun] Ru Zhu Qi,? Yin Xu. [Bo Ya] Wife is called Zhi Huan. One said the name of the concubine.　[Jiyun] Naidou cut, sound. Female characters.
